channel.title: Loading Problem!
channel.description: I've been unable to completely load my save files (Auto and Manual) for a while now... As normal, I boot up the game via Steam. Then the game menu loads up, and I press load game and choose my most recent save file. As of then, the loading pop-up appears and loads completely until the last... White widget thigny. Weirdly, the game does not crash... Or my computer is just unable to detect a crash of the game, which it normally can. PLEASE HELP!!! :'(:'(:'(

item.title: Loading Problem!
item.dc:creator: blueman010
item.description:
mshee32:

revert to an much older save

It didn’t help, but starting from a new game did.

Read full topic

item.title: Loading Problem!
item.dc:creator: blueman010
item.description:
I’ve been unable to completely load my save files (Auto and Manual) for a while now… As normal, I boot up the game via Steam. Then the game menu loads up, and I press load game and choose my most recent save file. As of then, the loading pop-up appears and loads completely until the last… White widget thigny. Weirdly, the game does not crash… Or my computer is just unable to detect a crash of the game, which it normally can. PLEASE HELP!!! :’(:’(:’(

Read full topic
